May 17, 1967
Mr. Myron M. Curry-
905 N. 25th St.
Grand Forks, N. D. 58201
Dear Myron:
Herewith is the original letter from Harley 0. Staggers,
Chairman of the Committee which will handle the H. R. 6736
and S. 1160, Public Television Act of 1967 hearings. I
believe I sent you a copy of my letter to Mrs Staggers
which will identify his Committee.
Sincerely,
L. F. P. Curry
LFPCsza
